chapters.title: Chapter 45: Tendrils of Mist
chapters.info: Mashadar, p. 869—The evil that consumed Aridhol, now called Shadar Logoth, during the Trolloc Wars. It can kill simply by making contact with its victims. Mashadar is a mindless cloud, but upon joining with the body and soul of Padan Fain, it became Shaisam, a being capable of seeking out its prey. See also Fain, Padan; Mordeth; Shaisam.
